CustomField.description: Class name that implements ICursorBatchQueryBuilder interface. Used by CursorJob for metadata-driven coordinator configuration. The class must have a no-arg constructor and implement the buildQuery(String methodName) method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of a class implementing ICursorBatchQueryBuilder (e.g., DealsSelector). Required for CursorJob; leave blank for custom coordinator classes.
CustomField.label: Query Builder Class
